"
I created the following flow using power automate. can you provide Python code (IDE PyCharm) to do the same thing

# Start of autogenerated actions using the recorder
@@source: 'Recorder'
WebAutomation.LaunchChrome.AttachToChromeByUrl TabUrl: 'https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/IBM/financials' AttachTimeout: 10 BrowserInstance=> Browser
@@source: 'Recorder'
WebAutomation.Click.Click BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/IBM/financials\'']['Div \'Breakdown\''] ClickType: WebAutomation.ClickType.LeftClick MouseClick: True
@@source: 'Recorder'
WAIT 2
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{LControlKey}({C})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
@@source: 'Recorder'
UIAutomation.PressButton Button: appmask['TaskBar']['Button \'Word - 2 running windows\'']
@@source: 'Recorder'
UIAutomation.Click.Click Element: appmask['Window \'Document3 - Word\'']['Edit \'Page 1 content\''] ClickType: UIAutomation.ClickType.LeftClick OffsetX: 136 OffsetY: 88 MousePositionRelativeToElement: UIAutomation.RectangleEdgePoint.TopLeft
@@source: 'Recorder'
WAIT 2
@@source: 'Recorder'
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: '{LControlKey}({V})'
# End of autogenerated actions using the recorder
"
